definition[0]: used to emphasize that someone is very excited about something and is eager for it to happen
example[0]: We’re going to Australia on Saturday – I can’t wait!
example[1]: I can’t wait to tell Gloria the good news.
example[2]: Laura could hardly wait to see the twins again.
example[3]: I can’t wait for the summer.
note[1]: somebody can’t wait/can hardly wait for
definition[1]: used humorously to say that something seems likely to be very boring
example[4]: A lecture on transformational grammar? I can hardly wait!
